code: import React from'react';import{setName as _setName}from"../../redux/actions/setActions";import{connect}from'react-redux';function Search(props){var handleChange=function handleChange(event){props.setName(event.target.value);};return React.createElement("input",{placeholder:"Search for a Card by Name...",value:props.name,onChange:handleChange,className:"search"});}var mapStateToProps=function mapStateToProps(state){return{name:state.name};};var mapDispatchToProps=function mapDispatchToProps(dispatch){return{setName:function setName(name){dispatch(_setName(name));}};};export default connect(mapStateToProps,mapDispatchToProps)(Search);
